bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when place a rigid object in the bin, an elastic object must be in the bin before
rules.3: when place a elastic object, a blue object must be in the bin before
